mention.text: veterinarians in some parts of the US
one state which held this view
the now infamous execution of Clayton Lockett in Oklahoma last week
Clayton Lockett in Oklahoma last week
a member of the Constitution Project s death penalty committee
Lawyers for Robert James Campbell , who is scheduled to be executed May 13
the Oklahoma execution last week of Lockett , the New York Times reports
the importation of lethal injection technology
people with mental disorders so severe
the approximately 3,000 US prisoners waiting to be put to death
